content: Hi players,In an effort to improve our reporting/ban appeals systems, we have moved over to a new website where a dedicated team will be reviewing all submissions. Please use the link below for all reports and ban appeals:https://pubgsupport.zendesk.com/

topic_title: PUBG Steam Hub Discussion Boards Update
content: After a lengthy discussion we have decided that we will no-longer be actively attending to the PLAYERUNKNOWN’S BATTLEGROUNDS Steam Community forums. There are multiple reasons for this but the decision ultimately comes down to the fact that we are unable to work efficiently due to the moderation systems, or lack thereof, put in place by Steam. As our game has grown in popularity we have found that the amount of spam, rage posts, and other content that needs to be moderated, has increased to the point where we are unable to do so without full moderation tools found on every other forum platform.We encourage you all to come to our Official Forums where all our Steam Moderators and Community Team will now be focusing their attention.PS: Please still try to be nice to each other here :)PUBG Official Forums[forums.playbattlegrounds.com]

PLAYERUNKNOWN’S BATTLEGROUNDS Steam Forum GuidelinesWhile there are a number of rules you’re required to read and understand to participate on these forums, there are some rather simple ways you can safely avoid breaking them. Contribute ConstructivelKeep your posts on-topic, both for the sub-forum and the thread in which you’re posting. Give feedback that can contribute to a conversation. Respect your fellow forum-goers, even when you disagree with them. Be Friendly and PoliteBe good to one another. Don’t insult anyone directly, including the Bluehole staff. Don’t publicly call out other users or players. Don’t use hate speech of any kind, including (but not limited to) hate speech related to ethnicity, race, sexuality, gender, life choice, political inclination or slurs of any kind. Moderators are present on these forums to maintain the community and ensure all players are encouraged to participate here. If it’s decided that you’re being destructive in any way, a punishment will be issued. Official RulesThe rules below are non-exhaustive and moderators can and will use their judgement when dealing with disruptive behaviour. All the decisions taken by the moderators are final. Any attempt to circumvent these rules is an offence in itself.If you have a complaint or criticism, provide constructive suggestions on how the problem might be addressed. Don't attack the developers, the staff, or other forum members. This forum is meant for active PLAYERUNKNOWN’S BATTLEGROUNDS players who are interested in supporting and improving the game and its community.Rule CircumventionDo not rule-dodge or purposely skirt just around breaking a rule. Hate Speech/Extreme VulgarityWe tolerate no hate speech of any kind, including (but not limited to) any directed at ethnicity, race, gender, sexuality or anything else deemed inappropriate by the moderation team. Vulgarity deemed extreme or excessive is also prohibited on these forums.Inappropriate ContentAvoid posting other content that's not suitable for these forums, including (but not limited to) discussions, videos, images or avatars containing real life nudity, gore, substance abuse or sacrilege. Illegal Activity The endorsement or discussion of personally conducted illegal activity is prohibited.Advertising & PromotionPlease avoid advertising any games or commercial ventures that are not owned by Bluehole. Do not post threads about the advertising of raffles, giveaways, auctioning or videos and websites which are selling, distributing or promoting any cheats or gambling websites, this also may include hacks or other third party programs and solutions meant to grant in-game advantage to players. Harassment & ThreatsHarassing and personally threatening other forum users is absolutely prohibited. Personal Attacks/Real Life InformationYou may not issue direct attacks to other users, nor may you reveal real world information (address, name, etc.) of any forum users. MisrepresentationYou may not falsely present yourself as a moderator or an employee of Bluehole, whether explicitly or implicitly. You may not falsely present yourself as another player or person. SpamWe have issued a zero tolerance rule on spam that consists of numbers, symbols, and just random characters, threads which include no topics/posts without actual content. This includes “first!” posts, bumping topics or anything in that category. No repeat posts/topics. No “thread necromancy,” AKA posting in a thread that’s long since been inactive. Spam includes asking for keys and/or access to the game.
To report bugs and technical issues, please go to our official forum linked below:http://forums.playbattlegrounds.com/forum/10-bug-reports/

topic_title: Performance Tweaks / FPS Fix - Low Spec or High Spec.
content: First off, this is just to help others. There is always someone out there that says "rofllol I dont need help because I'm the best in the world".. If you don't want my help nor read what I'm typing down here, that's more than fine.But this helped me get 70-85 FPS stable on very old system, only new thing I got is GTX 1050 Ti 4Gb.So, lets begin?Background Programs / Services For all Windows versions it is crucial to disable Windows update, Windows defender and other crapware from Windows. You may think why? Well, answer is easy - imagine if you play and you see someone in your scope and you are close to pull the trigger then Windows Update kicks in and you get a tiny lag which probably cause you to miss target and blow your cover and you start swearing because the noob in your scope is obviously cheating because you missed the target.As for all background services it's obvious what it does, it runs in the background eating up your memory whenever you play, not playing etc. # List of services you can disable #* Windows Update & Windows Defender* Antivirus / Firewall ( disable this only for max free memory, most for low spec systems ).* Xbox Live Services ( Disable all of these ).- If you find more services that you recognize you can try to disable them, but the major ones is the ones I already wrote down above.Windows 10 Performance & Pagefile# Adjust your Windows 10 for best Performance #* Right click on “Computer” icon and select “Properties”* Select “Advanced System settings”* Go to the “Advanced”* In the field "Performance" Click on  “Settings....”* Choose “Adjust for best performance” and “Apply”.* Click “OK” and Restart your computer.# Adjusting the Pagefile #* Right click on “Computer” icon and select “Properties”* Select “Advanced System settings”* Go to the “Advanced”* In the field "Performance" Click on  “Settings....”* Go to the "Advanced"* Under "Virtual Memory" Click on "Change"- Enable the Pagefile on all SSD / SSHD drives, set it as "System Managed".- Restart ComputerWindows 10 ntoskrnl.exe High CPU usage / Ram Usage* Disable Runtime Broker to fix high CPU and memory usageGo to Start menu > Settings app and then open System > Notifications & Actions. Deselect the option “Show me tips about Windows” and reboot the computer.* Memory leak can be a faulty Raid driver as well ( if you run that ) and updating your Raid driver may or may not fix this memory leak but many reports have claimed that updating the Raid driver actually fixes this.* Some discussion threads suggest that Runtime Broker is one such system process that eats a large chunk of CPU power due to the poor memory optimization. This ntoskrnl.exe Windows 10 doesn’t deliver any functionality as such, so you can disable it to solve the Windows 10 high memory leakage problem.- To disable the Runtime Broker, open the Settings app and go to System. Inside System window, locate Notifications & Actions and unselect “Show me tips about Windows.” Now restart the PC to bring it back to the normal and fix high RAM and CPU usage.Parked CPU CoresA parked CPU Core is a nightmare for all of us that is familiar with the issue it causes and it's like a new computer for some of us when they get unparked and runs all the time 24/7, but what really is the downside of having a parked CPU Core(s) ? Why should you UnPark it ?* Unparking a CPU Core would especially on lower spec systems make a huge performance boost in terms of loading and FPS ( usually makes FPS more stable and gets rid of stuttering ).# Example of Parked Cores on my old Q9550 CPU #> When I started playing PUBG I noticed stuttering very often, and bad performance overrall, I thought to myself that there's gotta be something to fix here, so I checked my CPU's and 2 of them were parked. So technically my CPU was only running at 50% now and then, it didn't mean nothing if I OC'ed the CPU from 2,7 > 3,8ghz.I unparked the Cores and voilá, the game ran like drunk lady down the street - not flawlessly but definetely ALOT better than it used to run. Stuttering was gone and loading times is faster. So I really recommend this one.Ingame Graphic Settings* Set Anti-Aliasing to High and Texture to Ultra or High then rest on low.- View distance and the other crap settings doens't really matter really, it only eats FPS.- Besides, putting View Distance on Max doesn't make you see other players at greater distance compare to low settings either.SSD, SSHD or HDD?* Well answer to that question is pretty simple. All games should be installed on an SSD for faster loading times. Windows should also be installed on an SSD for faster boot / loading up games.* SSHD is the next best one, it's an Hybrid drive of both SSD and HDD and can also run games pretty good, me personally got PUBG installed on a Hybrid Drive and I'm pleased with it.* HDD drives... well, if you got nothing left and HDD is all you got go for it.Edit: Running Game on High Priority Also Helps :)That's about it, if it helped you thats cool. If it didn't, I suggest you get to googling and see if you can solve it.Just remember to run PUBG good enough I'd recommend GTX 1050 Ti 4GB, 970 works too I've heard but oh well...it all depends on budget :)

topic_title: Why the heck does hitting F in a slow boat kill you immediately?
content: So I was just in a game, partner and me both had kar98ks suppressed with 8xs, sniping drops. We start moving a little, maybe 50 kmh, he hits f after trying to hit r to reload. In the next 3 seconds, my pubg crashes and then the servers are down. 10/10 good job pubg corp.Anyways, why the hell does that knock you out? Has no one in pubg corp ever ridden a boat? Ive  gone 60mph on a jet ski and fallen and been fine. Since when does going 25mph and jumping out of a boat immediately kill you? Are they stupid? Please don't reply that water has surface tension. When you hit water, you are jumping in, not hitting it at a vertical trajectory going 30 mph. Your feet break it first, you might fall down, but break your leg you will not. Why the heck is immediate knocks a thing on a boat?

topic_title: I NOW see why mirimar is GARBAGE! 100% fail
content: It took me awhile to admit it to myself.. cause it was a new map.. I liked how the towns was laid out and spread out.. but driving around even in a truck is absolutely pointless.. I was just playing on the test server.. 8 people left.. and 10 out of 10 tries to outrun the blue I would have been able to do it, in a truck.. how far I needed to go, with as many meds and boosts as I had.. literally I was 200 meters from where I needed to be when the blue started.. but from my position there was no roads going the way I needed to go, so im in first person where u can barely see whats coming  anyway out of the vehicles... and its DIP after DIP after DIP the type u cant drive up.. you just run into them.. whoever designed this map honest to GOD needs fired.. point blank.. they should release the 4x4 map soon and RIP mirimar.. no one wants to play it.. the new map they did elevation the right way.. no one wants to play a map they cant drive on.. not to mention making it where enemies could be in ANY of the thousands of Divits and ditches as far as the eye can see.. NEVER LET the person who designed the mirimar map EVER design a map again.. unless you was going for the "im going to make a map the players hate playing on, and go as far as edititing game files to take the damn map out of rotation, and then say we will ban anyone messing with the game files and force them to play a map that is absolutely HORRIBLE"if so.. you nailed it!

content: Yesterday I went to the public internet and I saw one man was hacking in PUBG. I only know his ingame name, so what could I do to report him? I have image evidence, where should I send it to?

From my first experience shooting feels solid, it's realistic in terms of recoil etc. even when compared to FPS simulations (Arma, Squad, Insurgency).Gun sounds are realistic and feel powerfull.Bulletdrop is also actually realistic.Bullet damage is not realistic, but if it get's lowered i'm afraid it will throw the game unbalanced. Because you'd get bursted really quickly and will make healing items extremely useless.My only con is the bullet velocity. When an enemy is 50m away from you and moving. you still have to aim about 2m infront of him. This is rediculous when this is even the case with 556, 762 and the MWP sniper rifle.You should only have low bullet velocity when you're using a 12gauge, 9mm or 45ACP.And don't give me that ''git gud''♥♥♥♥♥♥ because the game is very easy in solo and hitting people from 50m away isn't a challenge. The only problem is that it's unrealistic, unnecesary and completely unimmersive.here you have a .300magnum sniper rifle that makes you feel invincible in long ranges. but you can't hit even a moving target from 50-100m way when aiming directly on him or slightly infront of him.In my experience i had to aim about 3-5m infront of a moving target that was running and about 75-100m away.....If the devs would ''fix'' this and give firearms more realistic velocity, it'll actually be perfect.

so I've been banned from PubG for "hacking/cheating"  after months of almost daily play with a regular squad.   Needless to say I'm not Chinese or a hacker.I have over 500hr on record, why would I cheat knowing that I would get banned?...I think my stats speak for themselves (I'm rubbish). never had another ban in like 15 years of gaming (always with the same username)RainbowSix Siege, and Unturned also use the Battleye system, and I have not been banned from these.I appealed it, and support have told me they can't do anything, they "assure" me i was violating their terms. They also won't tell me why."please understand that a restriction is placed because we have determined that there was a violation of our terms and services."  but they won't tell me what the violation was."We apologize but we cannot provide any specifics on the details of the violation" not very helpful."we do not accept any requests for rechecking account restrictions"  good to know they think they are infallible."We will continue our work to make sure that no erroneous restrictions are made"  ... well you just made one, how about fixing that??"Please note that even without having any programs specifically for “hacking/cheating” there are other programs or actions that can violate our Rules of Conduct and cause a permanent restriction" if someone told me what these were, maybe I could check.I'm tempted to buy the game again as I really do enjoy it, but without any information as to what caused the Ban ... what's to stop it happening again.When we have replays saved for the matches, why can't these be reviewed as part of an appeals process? yes I know there are Millions of players, but they have earned enough money from this venture to support this.quite frankly, it's BullSh*t. and I'm furious!!     F'king lame BlueHole!It's like getting a parking fine for supposedly parking illegally, but being given no proof of this when I know I wasn't there  (I did get my parking fine cancelled though!).

topic_title: Crash at start of match while loading
content: Both PUBG and the Closed Experimental Server have the same problem except the experimental gets to the point where I can see the inside on my face, then crashes. No error code shows up on the crash report. I have tried:restarting my computerreinstalling PUBGdeleting and reinstalling the battlEye service (BEService.exe and BEService_pubg.exe)Manually removing configuration settingsUpdating windows and Device driversrunning steam as Admin. PUBG worked fine until recently. Last played on 3/14/18, so the problem started on one of the patches since then. System specs:CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 1700XMotherboard: B350-PC-MATE (MS-7A34)RAM: DDR4 32GBGPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070Windows 10Not currently overclocked. If there anything I'm missing please ask.

topic_title: Hit reg is still utter bull♥♥♥♥
content: Not sure if its because the servers are 16 tick or if the game is to blame, but having as bad as this hit reg is not acceptable. topic_title: I HAVE AN IDEA TO STOP CHEATING!!
content: You sign up with your credit card and drivers licence (or any form of goverment approved ID). You will have a mobile authenticator and fingerprint scan on your phone to login to your steam account similiar to Google auth or Last-Pass or the Steam app already has. If your account associated with this Trust factor program is Vac banned or battle eye banned you get fined $200-1000USD (higher for compedative players). If you opt into this you will get to play on Trust Factor servers similiar to CSGO but with real punishment if your cheating. ESEA or Faceit could implement this as well and people would be much less likely to cheat. If a ban occurs (And may be fasle) you can opt to have it reviewed for free the first time or take no fine and never use the service again (Your Id is banned from use adding real concequence). If you take the fine you will get a ban duration based on your crime . You will be able to play again one day. People deserve a 2nd chance, but they have to pay for it. All money rasied this way will be used to develop better anti cheat systems. Obvisously you opt into this program and sign a contract, so if you cheat you desreve the black mark on your record and a fine. With the 2 factor auth it will be hard to steal an identity but not impossible which would be the only tricky aspect. The only way to stop cheating is to make people pay when they get caught and hold the person responible. E-sports players get payed nearly as much as professional athletes, athletes get fined for cheating. Hell you can get fined for cheating in amatuer automotive racing which people do for fun on weekends. Cheaters need to pay. It works IRL why not ingame.

topic_title: To Those Skeptical About Cheaters in the Alpha Server
content: If you were a hacker and wanted a perfect place NOT to get banned, where would you go? Bluehole is overwhelmed by reports of hacking in the normal 1.0 release. They definitely don't handle test server reports, and now Bluehole has added ANOTHER layer, the experimental test server. At first, I thought only dedicated players and fans would try to get a key and have fun, before the hackers in the regular game ruin it. I was dead wrong. The Alpha server seems to be ATTRACTING hackers. They know they aren't going to get banned, three layers removed from the actual game because the developers can't even get the 1.0 release under control. Thanks for not creating a fun gaming environment, and encouraging cheaters to get away with it with no consequences.

topic_title: Escape eSports is inviting players of all skill ranges [NA][EU]
content: Escape E-Sports is inviting members of all kind to join us in our Discord! (https://discord.gg/2GTByx8). Looking for a group?Since Escape has hundreds of members online all the time we encourage you to be active in our discord. We have lots of members always looking for people to form groups with, and generally everyone in our community is really friendly. Skill levels vary, if you want highly skilled our leisurely play we suggest putting that in your message when looking for a group. What is Escape?Here at Escape, we provide extra entertainment for an everyday PC gamer by hosting Tournaments and Special Events. We also hold a large community for the most popular eSport Video Games. Visit our website for a better idea. Http://www.escapeesports.comWhy choose Escape?Escape takes pride in our friendly atmosphere and we are going to keep it that way. Our number one goal is to make sure our members are having fun. In order to do this we have a zero tolerance rule to any kind of abuse and harassment. This means all our communities are heavily moderated with both Bots and Administrators. Escape isn't just a community, we make sure our members are active and social by involving you with up and coming decisions. We have weekly polls that our members get to participate in, these polls help us at Escape understand what our members really want from us. Lastly, Escape hosts monthly tournaments and has almost weekly giveaways. We want our members to stay and we want to reward our members for just being apart of us. So we are rather generous with our giveaways and prizes for just competing in our events and tournaments.Our Growth.Escape eSports grows more and more everyday with many of people joining every week. We were Established on December 7th, 2017 and we currently have over 750 members. We are proud of our growth and we will continue to grow because we do it right. Come join, and find out for yourself.Thank you for your time,Escape eSports Staff

topic_title: Hacks will NEVER be the concern of this company.
content: Four days ago (2/15/18), I was temporarly suspended for a high amount of reports / abnormal game logs, you can view that thread here:http://steamcommunity.com/app/578080/discussions/1/2860219962085270434/After my suspension was lifted, two days ago (2/17/18), I started playing the game again and withen 6 hours, I had been killed by a hacker. So I did what any concerned player would do, I took the plays.tv recording, uploaded it to youtube, and submitted a support ticket on the battlegrounds support website along with a zipped copy of the replay. You can see that thread here:http://steamcommunity.com/app/578080/discussions/1/2860219962094169054/My ticket was submitted on saturday, at 10:55am. Two days later, today, Monday, at 10:19am an automated message was finally delivered in response to my ticket...Here is an image of the ticket i submitted:http://prntscr.com/ih2xtcHere is an image of the automated response I recieved:https://prnt.sc/ih2kfxAfter seeing this, it's clear to me the support team at https://support.playbattlegrounds.com doesn't even read submitted tickets. This automated message is another example of how bluehole has failed their player base, and will continue to fail on every level in relation to the player. Here is the video of the cheater, incase anyone was interested, and didnt want to open the other thread:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MqF4PPGtURAHacks seen at 0:45

topic_title: FPS Drops in Erangel 2 staged or more buildings
content: The title says it all. Average fps outside is 70 and when entering 2 staged houses or more it drops to 40-45 until I exit the house or look outside of a window. Tried reinstall of windows 10, the game and the AMD drivers, tried different AMD Crimson drivers and driver settings (texture filtering, tesselation off, etc.), tried launch options, disabling security, lowest settings, configs in the engine file, the override DPI scaling option in the properties, setting power to high performance, core unparking, disabled xbox and GameDVR from everywhere, did some windows 10 optimizations videos, set the process to high and disabled core3, verified game cache, set paging file too but the problem is still here and happens only in Erangel houses. PC: Intel G4600, Rx 460 2 gb, 8 Gb RAM DDR4. I have no such problems in any other game but it happened like 1 2 month ago. I also forgot to mention that I already cleaned %temp% and Prefetch, cookies (used CCleaner and Disk cleaner), defragmented, checked temperatures but everything is okay. I can't understand what is happening the last 1 2 months with the game. Even clean installed windows and the AMD drivers and I even tried to use older drivers but the problem is still here. Im playing on lowest settings 1680x1050 and like I said it only occurs on Erangel's buildings. Any ideas?

How does the number "ninety-nine percent" come from? Is it easy to say, or is it accurate?First, the game has sold more than 10 million copies in China, and how can it account for half of the total sales? In addition to the other half of the players from various countries, more dispersed, it is easy to get the impression of "Chinese people everywhere".Second, one of the impact of Chinese players is that it will lower the cost of software, that is to say, the cost of opening and hanging is lower. If there are only tens of thousands of players in a country, it is not easy for you to find a companion team. And China can have tens of millions of players, such a big market, and a "Jedi survival Simulator" can sell more than 30 thousand copies in China, and the market of plug-ins should be bigger. So the power of the producer is more powerful, and it is always conceivable.Third, it is the developed network trading market in China. What should a foreigner do if he wants to "buy illegal outside"? He doesn't have a reliable channel: it's a gray deal, but Amazon /steam can't buy it. The transaction cost is also a problem. And in China, the player of the game will inevitably think of going to Taobao. As the market itself is big, it is easy to have a stable supplier, not to say that there is a "Taobao" as a universal platform.The above three points are the common problems faced by any game after China's fire. That is to say, the characteristics of Chinese market decide that it is more difficult to eliminate plug-ins than abroad. In addition, there are two problems of the game itself: first, he put a lot of calculation on the local, the difficulty of making the outside, magnified the influence above. Second, this game can be said to be the "Royale" model of the second games, before there is a same type of fire is H1Z1, the game player here, before the continuation of the easy behavior mode: no bottom line, it is reckless, plus a fire.Please recognize that ninety-nine percent of hackers are Chinese! But by no means ninety-nine percent of the Chinese are hackers!China's huge population base is a legacy of feudal ideas in the last century!Remember! Respect is mutual! !

topic_title: Confused about Pubg Sounds (versus players) Anyone else having issues?
content: I think i'm nearing 600 hours into this game if not already and I'm still confused about the sounds each player makes when it's a one versus one. Specifiically when I get killed because I don't hear the other player make noise. However when I watch the deathcam, not only are they making so much noise that they should be heard from an audio perspective from my character, they of course can hear me as well.For example I'm lying down outside the open barns, making 0 sound (prone). The player is maybe 20-25 feet from me. Crouch walking towards me, for some reason I hear nothing.Watch the death cam, when they are that close I SHOULD be getting audio hints of their location. Death cam presents the sound of them crouch walking towards me. Yet I hear 0 of it.I've also been playing at Windows Sound 90% and 100% in game volume just to hopefully hear players better but this isn't always the case. Stereo Headsets as well, since I've been seeing a lot of people complain on forums that surround sound headsets aren't that great with this games audio and also streamers (e.g. Shroud) also state the same.Is this a common theme for many of you? Where you find that you hear 0 of opposing players momvements, yet they perfectly hear you? It should be an equal trade of audio hunts, yet it's not always the case.Thanks!

我只想问问我的游戏帐号为什么被封，检测一天就一百年了，我承认自己菜行吧，爆头都没高于过百分之二十，最顺的时候才杀了十一的，怎么就是挂了，有这么菜的挂？

从2017年9月10号开始接触这个游戏，一直到现在，对于外挂我是一直嗤之以鼻的，一直强烈谴责使用外挂的玩家。所以我从来不开挂。   游戏本来就是为了让大家开心的，但是开心不一定要得第一才会开心，我认为和朋友在一起的美好时光才是最开心的。我有一个很好的团队，我们在一起游戏的时候并不是一味地以第一为目标，而是对游戏的本身进行探索，发掘更多游戏趣味，所以我的技术一直不是很好，从来没有击杀过很多玩家，所以根本没有必要开挂，但是，今天是四月3日，我上线的时候发现我被vac封禁100年，我觉得很委屈。我真的没有开挂，我也没有必要开挂，大家可以去看我小黑盒的战绩，一直都没有单人吃鸡过，都是我的大腿带我玩的，我也一直是个盒子精。  无论是从哪个方面看，我都是属于那种老老实实玩游戏的那种玩家。对于这次封禁，我比愤怒更多的是失望。因为蓝洞公司你们真的是无药可救！更新表情系统9个多g，更新反外挂只是换了个端口。关乎到游戏性的服务器问题和反外挂机制你们不去解决，反而一味的开发新地图和枪械皮肤。不去封禁开挂玩家，来封禁我们这种坚守底线和外挂作斗争的玩家。真的是好坏放不清了吗？   我是一名学生，98元的价格不是小数目，同时还要月供三十元加速器，和网吧的网费，付出那么多只是为了享受游戏带来的快乐，可是蓝洞公司你们做的实在是太过分了，从锁区和反外挂机制可以看的出贵公司对中国玩家的不重视，我并不希望蓝洞公司把国家之间的摩擦带到玩家之间，玩家是不分国度的，不要因为我们是不同国家而区别对待。望贵公司慎重看待此事，尽快作出回应。本人被封禁账号:159619487001游戏内昵称:WTS0831联系方式:15961948700

Think about it. It would make the S12K actually usefull. You could strap a 4x on there and do some sniping. Granted the 15x would still be ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ and slightly over the top but It would be somewhat more usefull then it is now.I tried to *snipe* my friend with a 8x at about 40 m and It didnt even hit him. Im not saying that the S12K can only use slug. I think you should find slug rounds 10% of the time while normal buckshot is found the other 90%. Or they could add explosive rounds. Any of these things would make shotguns a force to be reckoned with. Shotguns as they are now are so lack luster. They have such unpredictable damage and are outclassed in almost all situations but other guns. This addition would make the S12k and other shotguns a viable option for late game. I feel the S12K is more of a last ditch effort as it is right now. These are just my thoughts.

topic_title: A little news to those complaining about the game.
content: Are you on the programming team working hard hours to desperately patch glitches as they're found? Are you a skilled software engineer who has many years of programming in C++? If the answer is no then you have no room to complain about minor glitches in a huge game like pubg. Skyrim has glitches up the wall, why hasn't anyone cried at them? How about Fortnite glitches, they have loads of those. However no one is complaining.I have roughly 500 hours on this game, and I've only ever experienced glitches that ruin games once or twice, and usually they were forced by me messing around. You need to face the facts about this game, it's not as bad as you think it is, it's just that you can't kill people. You aren't good at the game. There isn't as many hackers as you think there are, it's just that you can't efficiently survive to final 10 long enough to see actual skill.This community is giving people who slave away long hours for one of biggest games in the world crap because of a few minor glitches, it's like half of you don't even read the change logs. They're constantly patches glitches, hell half the updates are only that. However the only thing you guys notice is the little additions they put in the game to give people a good reason to update."Oh a new crate came out, I wish instead of making crates they'd patch the game"Half of you who say this I can promise have never read an update log in their lives. In almost all their update logs, half of it is glitch patches. Half of it is them trying to manage servers. How about instead of complaining and being apart of a bandwagon, you guys try to work on giving actual reviews, and helpful suggestions.

topic_title: Map designers need to be fired! They dont know what they are doing!
content: The desert map: They made it have bigger landmass play area then the first one making the gameplay less action filled and slow phased, which is fine, it's good to have variation in maps and the meta design of them. The problem came when they on top of that made the terrain alot rougher/harder to move/drive around in and again on top of that the terrain have so many slopes and buildings people can and are camping literally everywhere.This basicly was adding topping, on the topping on the topping, on the topping of the cake making an extremely camp friendly and slow phased map most people found quite booring and alot of people want the map to be removed from the map pool, or atleast have the option to not queue for it.What i wrote above are basicly why they made this new 4x4 map. To give all those who want more action filled faster phased map what they ask for.And yeah. Sure, the new 4x4 map give you alot of action in some sense. It's so small you basicly are forced to fight people when you land, it's really arent easy to land in a remote place with few or no other people like in the other 2maps. But the map have such an extreme amout of trees, bushes and foliage, like WAY WAY WAY WAY WAY more then the original map, the meta of the map will quickly turn to an even bigger camp fest where majority of people are alot more afraid to move around and push for some action then the original map because there's just to many hiding spots to safely move anywhere.The new map meta and how the design of the map will lead to this result for most players = a few fights when you land making for some action at start of a game. Then a big camp fest and move as little as you can.This completely counters the faster phased meta gameplay the map are made for. It's like making an formula-1 car with offroad tire patterns. It just does not make sense and are working against eachother.The only conclusion to be made about these meta gameplay decisions of the maps being made in this game are that the map designers just do not have a clue what they are doing. They are working against themself and there seem to be no thought at all about the design, they just randomly make the map with no thoughts at all how the terrain will affect the meta gameplay.Probably will be a bunch of people telling me i am wrong. Just wait and see. If they do not change the new map design and keep all these bushes and foliage the meta will quickly turn into first few min = action then people camp even harder then the original map.

topic_title: Is this a desync issue or something... else?
content: So, when playing FFP, how much of a player's head do I have to see stick over a hill (or whatever) before I should worry about being shot? (The answer: any amount, it seems.)Case in point: I see a tier 2 helmet over a ridge, but not enough to see the player's face, yet I get shot to death by said player. When I watch the death cam (which I realize isn't terribly accurate) the guy has a commanding field of view, and seems well over the cest of the hill, shooting me with ease, as I turf every single round (trying to hit the tiny target presented on my screen).Is this an issue of the game getting out of sync (annoying but innocent), or something more nefarious?

topic_title: Green screen flickering + heavy stuttering when going fullscreen 1080P??
content: Here is how this happend, i accidently opened Windows start menu which minimized my game, tried to go back on Pubg window, game starts to flicker while windowed mode even though it was fullscreen, then switched it back to full screen (1920 x1080), game starts to flicker green, i proceed to turn off the game and start it up again, then now it flickers black while it is in fullscreen and at the same time the game screen was also windowed while at 1920x1080...Game started to cause massive lag from the flickering (could possibly killed my system), couldnt move my mouse to switch it to windowed mode, couldnt even open task manager to close the game, so just ended up restarting the whole computer. Now every time i open the game and if the game is at fullscreen at 1080p, it just lags my entire computer.Why is this even a issue for this game period?!.In-case you ask for specs:Processor: AMD Ryzen 1600X 3.60 GHzRam: Hyper Fury x dual channel 8GB DDR4 Water Cooling: Corsair H60MOBO: Megabyte Aorus Ax370-Gaming K5Main GPU: MSI Geforce GTX 980 GamingSSD: ADATA Ultimate SU800 512GBPower Supply: Corsair CX750M 750Watt Bronze CXM SeriesNvidea Drivers are up to date so there shouldnt even be this kind of issue at all.And Average Frames is usually around 60-80 Frames a second so i dont see how my system can't handle this game.

topic_title: AutoHotKey Script for Rebinding the Aim Key
content:
A friend of mine had trouble with the way the aim key works. As you probably know holding the aim key (default is the right mouse button) enables zoomed aim mode and clicking it toggles the ads mode (iron sight, scope, red dot etc.). As of now the game only provides a option to rebind the key. But there is no way to seperate those aim modes or disable one or the other.I decided to write a little AHK script to remove these limitations. After several days of testing and multiple games I want to share the script with the community.DisclaimerUse this script at your own risk. As far as I know the developer hasn't released a statement about the use of AutoHotKey. If you want to be on the safe side, don't use the script!Features Change the ADS aim from toggle to hold Recognizes if the player is aiming for a reliable ADS mode Passthrough key to access the original aim key Toggle On/Off keyKnown Limitations The default settings only work for 16:9 aspect ratios, but you can easily modify the settings by editing the settings.ini The script only works in fullscreen window mode (aka. borderless window) Pressing the ads key while sitting in a car will only start aiming. you have to press it again to stop aiming (it's basically the classic toggle behavour)Quick Start Guide for 16:9 UsersThis guide will setup the script for 16:9 resolutions and with the default settings (ads via holding the right mouse button and "disabling" the other zoom mode) Download and Install AutoHotkey if you haven't already Copy the script from this thread and paste it into a .ahk file Make sure your game is running in fullscreen window mode (video settings) Run/Compile the script Test the functionality in the warm up phase by grabbing a gun and aim in all three positions (stand, crouch, prone) (Optional) You can disable the hotkeys and restore the standard behaviour any time by pressing F1. This is a toggle hotkey so pressing it again will turn it back on. Suspending the hotkeys is indicated by a low frequency beep and a green S icon in your tray. Enabling is indicated by a high frequency beep and a green H icon in your tray After your done playing I recommend to exit the script by right clicking the green H or S icon in the tray and select "Exit"This is the script:#NoEnv
SetWorkingDir %A_ScriptDir%

IniRead, suspendKey, settings.ini, Hotkeys, suspendKey, F1
IniRead, adsKey, settings.ini, Hotkeys, adsKey, RButton
IniRead, passthroughKey, settings.ini, Hotkeys, passthroughKey, BLANK
IniRead, aimKey, settings.ini, PUBGKeyMapping, aimKey, RButton

IniRead, useAnchors, settings.ini, Recognition, useAnchors, true
if(%useAnchors%)
{
 IniRead, standTargetAnchorX, settings.ini, Recognition, standTargetAnchorX, 0.0234375
 IniRead, standTargetAnchorY, settings.ini, Recognition, standTargetAnchorY, 0.9287037
 IniRead, crouchTargetAnchorX, settings.ini, Recognition, crouchTargetAnchorX, 0.0244792
 IniRead, crouchTargetAnchorY, settings.ini, Recognition, crouchTargetAnchorY, 0.9472222
 IniRead, proneTargetAnchorX, settings.ini, Recognition, proneTargetAnchorX, 0.0322917
 IniRead, proneTargetAnchorY, settings.ini, Recognition, proneTargetAnchorY, 0.9564815
 
 standTargetX := Round(standTargetAnchorX * A_ScreenWidth)
 standTargetY := Round(standTargetAnchorY * A_ScreenHeight)
 crouchTargetX := Round(crouchTargetAnchorX * A_ScreenWidth)
 crouchTargetY := Round(crouchTargetAnchorY * A_ScreenHeight)
 proneTargetX := Round(proneTargetAnchorX * A_ScreenWidth)
 proneTargetY := Round(proneTargetAnchorY * A_ScreenHeight)
} else
{
 IniRead, standTargetX, settings.ini, Recognition, standTargetX, 45
 IniRead, standTargetY, settings.ini, Recognition, standTargetY, 1003
 IniRead, crouchTargetX, settings.ini, Recognition, crouchTargetX, 47
 IniRead, crouchTargetY, settings.ini, Recognition, crouchTargetY, 1023
 IniRead, proneTargetX, settings.ini, Recognition, proneTargetX, 62
 IniRead, proneTargetY, settings.ini, Recognition, proneTargetY, 1033
}

IniRead, targetColor, settings.ini, Recognition, targetColor, 0xf5f5f5
IniRead, variation, settings.ini, Recognition, variation, 10

IfNotEqual, suspendKey, BLANK, Hotkey, *%suspendKey%, suspend
IfNotEqual, adsKey, BLANK, Hotkey, *%adsKey%, adsKeyDown
IfNotEqual, adsKey, BLANK, Hotkey, *%adsKey% up, adsKeyUp
IfNotEqual, passthroughKey, BLANK, Hotkey, *%passthroughKey%, passthroughKeyDown
IfNotEqual, passthroughKey, BLANK, Hotkey, *%passthroughKey% up, passthroughKeyUp

return

suspend:
Suspend
if (A_IsSuspended)
 SoundBeep, 200
else
 SoundBeep
return

adsKeyDown:
IfNotEqual, aimKey, BLANK, SendInput {%aimKey%}
return

adsKeyUp:
PixelSearch, , , standTargetX, standTargetY, standTargetX, standTargetY, targetColor, variation, RGB
if !ErrorLevel
{
 IfNotEqual, aimKey, BLANK, SendInput {%aimKey%}
 return
}
PixelSearch, , , crouchTargetX, crouchTargetY, crouchTargetX, crouchTargetY, targetColor, variation, RGB
if !ErrorLevel
{
 IfNotEqual, aimKey, BLANK, SendInput {%aimKey%}
 return
}
PixelSearch, , , proneTargetX, proneTargetY, proneTargetX, proneTargetY, targetColor, variation, RGB
if !ErrorLevel
 IfNotEqual, aimKey, BLANK, SendInput {%aimKey%}
return

passthroughKeyDown:
IfNotEqual, aimKey, BLANK, SendInput {%aimKey% Down}
return

passthroughKeyUp:
IfNotEqual, aimKey, BLANK, SendInput {%aimKey% Up}
return
You don't need the settings file if you're fine with the default settings. But if you want to tweak the settings you have to create a file named settings.ini inside the working directory (the folder where the the script is in). Copy the sample config from below and paste it into the settings.ini file. This is also the default config.[Hotkeys]
;For a list of available keys visit: https://autohotkey.com/docs/KeyList.htm
;To disable a key type "BLANK"

;Hotkey to Suspend the Script
suspendKey=F1

;Hotkey to aim down sight
adsKey=RButton

;Hotkey which gets passed through to the assigned aim key
passthroughKey=BLANK

[PUBGKeyMapping]
;For a list of available keys visit: https://autohotkey.com/docs/KeyList.htm
;To disable a key type "BLANK"

;Enter the assigned aim key from PUBG. The default binding is the right mouse button
aimKey=RButton

[Recognition]
;Enter "true" if you want to use anchors or "false" if you want to use coordinates
useAnchors=true

;This part will only be used if "useAnchors" is set to "true"
;These anchors only work for 16:9 resolutions
standTargetAnchorX=0.0234375
standTargetAnchorY=0.9287037
crouchTargetAnchorX=0.0244792
crouchTargetAnchorY=0.9472222
proneTargetAnchorX=0.0322917
proneTargetAnchorY=0.9564815

;This part will only be used if "useAnchors" is set to "false"
;The default values only work for 1080p monitors
standTargetX=45
standTargetY=1003
crouchTargetX=47
crouchTargetY=1023
proneTargetX=62
proneTargetY=1033

;Target color for the scanned pixels
targetColor=0xf5f5f5

;Max difference between the target color and the found color
variation=10
Tweaking the script for other aspect ratiosIf you have a aspect ratio other than 16:9 you can either change the absolute coordinates of the target pixels or calculate the anchors. The anchors are calculated like by dividing the pixel  position by the screen width/height. For example: 45 / 1920 = 0.0234375. If you've calculated the anchors for your aspect ratio, please post them in this thread so other users can use them too. Posting the absolute coordinates will also help!The best way to find the pixel coordinates is to take 3 png screenshots while you're standing/crouching/proning and aiming in a dark place. Now you load those 3 screenshots into a image editing tool like GIMP. Now find a bright pixel on the aiming indicator in the bottom left corner of the screenshot. I recommend to use a pixel from the border of the indicator as these are less transparent. Now enter the coordinates into the settings.ini or calculate the anchors. If you are using a tool like reshade or any other tool which changes the color values (side note: f.lux doesn't affect these) you might need to change the targetColor or variation in the settings file.If you want me to do this for you, you can post the 3 screenshots in this thread. I will find the suitable pixels and post the anchor values in this thread.Why does it need to "see" my screen?You might be wondering why this simple remapping script needs visual information. The early version didn't scan pixels but because of that it was very unreliable. The script wasn't able to know if the player is aiming or not. Because of this you weren't able to place markers on the map without disabling the script or if you tried to aim while jumping you could end up with a inverted aim key. That's why the script now checks 3 specified pixels in the bottom left corner to determine wether the player is aiming or not.Making the developer aware of thisThis is just a workaround and it would be much better if there would be a setting ingame to change the aiming behaviour. So even if you don't want to use the script, let the devs know about this missing feature by replying to this thread or on the offical forums: http://forums.playbattlegrounds.com/topic/4805-toggle-option-to-swap-ads-functionalityholdpress/Let me know if you have any questions or suggestions

I have an Alienware R4, i7 processor with 1070 nvidia and 16gb RAM plus running pubg off an ssd which is far from full. Screen is capped at 60hz.I play off a fibre line from South Africa to Europe (we dont have servers here) with a local break out of 25mb up and down connected via cable to my laptop.Running pubg on ultra anti aliasing, ultra draw distance and everything else low or very low, v sync off.it had been playing great and smooth with no issues except the occasional rubber band or small lag every 5 or 6 games when on a less than ideal server in europe but otherwise i was happy, line was great, pc was great, i was having fun.Then about a month ago, out of the blue (haha), about a week after the nvidia update (the one that said it optimised better for pubg) and after a pubg update, the game started freezing. no message, just freezing. i could hear people running still and everything that had been happening carried on (environment moving, grass swaying etc.) but just my input could not be detected from the game. if i was running i would just stand still. this happened intermittently and for exactly 13 seconds of freeze, then 1 second back, then 1 second freeze then back on and away we go no problems until it does this exact same thing again.then there were more updates and now it still does the exact same thing but the game now says "network lag detected". still 13 seconds exactly, then 1 on then 1 off then carry on. it does it once to twice a game, every game and has cost me dinners etc blablabla.i have searched everywhere and have no clue whats going on. reinstalled earlier drivers, reset my whole comp. still does it.i also cant hear my mates on discord but they can hear me while this is happening. no other game seems to do this. CS GO on local servers is fine. Battlefield is fine etc.Please help

topic_title: This game is infuriating... It only gets worse.
content: The desync, lag, rubberbanding, horrid action response...This game honestly creates some of the best, tense filled, moments, but only as a side dish.  The entry is a big serving of mind-blowingly broken mediocrity.Over 2 million copies sold and we are still on ~10 tick servers.  Eight weeks into launch and the servers are still absolute garbage regardless of your personal internet connection.Yes, the game is more than worth $30 if you're on the fence.  You'll get way more milage than that.  The question you need to ask yourself is if you're okay with eventually just being so tired of feeling like landing a good server is like winning the lottery, or being run over by phantom cars, or having to restart your game every few games because you've loaded in and crashed, or from simply making it to the top ten and being sandwiched between a corpse box and a fence and "falling" to your death...Are you okay with that being the last ten hours you spend with this title?I guarantee you the first ten will be fun as hell (if you can get it to run decently).  But, the last ten are ♥♥♥♥ing insufferable.

topic_title: What do you think of Reloading animation (stops) when opening door?
content: I wanna suggest this: please allow double tap of F while reloading will open the door with the foot (slow or fast) just do it like "boot" opening so that the game stays realistic and the reloading has a "logical" reason not to halt.I hated the crouching stopping the reloading, you should instead reduce the ARCADE MODE (jump and shoot - hop and shoot) if one jumps = no aiming and neither reloading).Please allow instead to open doors while reloading.I saw the idea here posted from someone I wanna quote so I thought about PUBG (since I already thought some weeks ago: why stopping the reloading when opening a door?) and there you  go we have an option:F = open with handF + F = open with footOr simply: Reloading + F = open automatically with foot.That's it.https://feedback.huntshowdown.com/forums/907948-hunters/suggestions/33579886-doors-interactions-animations

topic_title: Why this game is trash and why not to buy it
content: Here's many of the reasons you shouldn't buy this.1- Optimization is pure♥♥♥♥♥♥ for a AAA game and after all this time it's not even prioritized. Even through I get 60fps constant there is always some random stutters2- Server Tick rate, its 15hz or less its really ♥♥♥♥♥♥ and yet they say "eSports ready" lol this game is a joke3- Cheaters everywhere and always will be hackers, why is that? Because anti-cheat is broken they don't want to improve it because when there is cheaters, there is people who will buy the game more times = more money, more greed?4- Hitreg / hitbox is awfull its worse than R6 Siege (Ye players who play it too know what im talking about.)5- Greedy Developers, they prioritize skins rather than server issues/bugs / perfomance, stability.6- Stay the fk away from this. The game was fun on the early access but right now its buggy and broken.  After 655h of this game, this is all i think.

topic_title: PUBG Mobile better than PC version
content: I have both versions and seem to like the mobile version better, game play seems more fun and there are certain features that are missing in the PC version that I would like to see from the mobile version, such as the dashed line in the beginning of the match where the path of the plane is suppose to go. The distance in meters is a nice touch when you place a marker down and how you can also see the distance away from your team mates as well. And I really enjoy the option of having the auto smart pick up feature where it will just grab items when you walk over them, and will replace any items you may have with a better version. This makes the game flow much nicer.Another thing I would like to see in all versions is when you place a marker down in the beginning of the match where your plane is flying over map, is the ability to see all markers, including yours and your team mates when you don't have the map open. I hate having to leave my map open to see where I'm suppose to go before I drop out of the plane. I want to close the map and just see the markers directly on the map itself so that I can easily navigate to the desired areas.Lastly, I notice that in the PC version it's much more difficult to find anything, such as weapons, protection, gear etc. On mobile version things are widely available. This makes it such a pain in the♥♥♥♥♥to find anything after you drop. Please increase the items, because most of the time when I make it to the ground, I'm already killed. Which makes the game no fun to me. Whats the point of playing if you die right when you land and barely have time to find your gear. This is why I tend to play the mobile version more.Again, just my personal opinion, I know everyone doesn't agree.

topic_title: PUBG stirbt auf grund der nichternstnahme der community
content: Ich habe schon ein review verfasst vor ca. 6 Monaten und dort bemängelte ich die bugs ich will nicht sagen, dass die entwickler gar nichts machen aber seit dem release habe ich immer mit dem sch**s Fallschirm zu kämpfen immer wenn man landen will bleibt man hängen. Vorallem an den Hotspots wie hacienda oder militärgelände mega ungünstig solangsam glaube ich dass die entwickler nur Geldgeile personen sind die nichts anderes machen als ihren Larry zu chillen und sich zu fragen wie sie noch mehr geld machen können. Ich bin ein riesen Fan von PUBG aber unter solchen Umständen kann ich das nichtmehr gutreden. Ich habe stehts versucht immer das gute in PUBG zu sehen und es immer versucht zu verteidigen von Kritik (in ausnahme der Bugs) . Doch jetz bin ich an einem Punkt angelangt an dem ich sage kein Wunder dass alle FORTNITE spielen und niemand braucht sich beschweren wenn in eienm Jahr keiner mehr PUBG spielt.Bluehole-heinis wacht endlich auf und neht die Kritik ernst oder last es ganz sein und nehmt die Server und das Spiel offline aber so kann es nicht weiter gehen.Ich hoffe wirklich dass ihr PUBG pappnasen es endlich mal kapiert ansonsten wird euer spiel als ein Flopp in erinnerung bleiben bei dem skins und emotes wichtiger waren als warnungen und kritik von den Spielern. Zum abschluss möchte ich noch sagen dass PUBG ein spiel ist wie kein anderes und ein Geschenk für spieler und entwickler ist allerdings wird dieses einst "enge" Band immer schwächer und schwächer.Also lasst das Spiel nicht kaputt gehen und wir als Spieler sollten es nicht aufgeben, doch wenn es soweit kommt dass es keinerlei antwort auf die fragen der community gibt dann muss man einfach sagen, dass es die Entwickler versaut haben und nicht wir die immer an das gute in dem Spiel geglaubt haben.

topic_title: NİCE NETWORDK LAG DETECDED NİCE BLUEHOLE
content: FİX THİS GAME YOU İDİOTS

I am based in Australia. There are times of day that there are not many options for a game, think like 5 minutes in the foyer waiting, obviously some times of day worse than others. To always get a game sometimes I access the Asian server where I seldom need to wait more than say 20 seconds.I propose to Steam/Pubg a selectable option during game entry to play in region locked mode with other region locked players, or open mode. Neither mode guarantees that you wont meet cheats, but it may give people the choice to play on a server where cheating may possibly be less often.Its about choice, as a shift worker my times of day to play dont match everyone else in my region, so if i want to play I choose a trade off. Practice against cheats is frustrating, not many chicken dinners, but i know I am still improving. Cheating will remain an issue, like viruses, the scripters generating new cheats will find loop holes that Pubg will always be chasing, so Kudos to Pubg for porgressing as they have. Unfortnately it will never be enough, but lets hope the identification of cheaters and their hacks continues to grow, and they are either A. banned with all likely probability to only reinvent as a new character, or B. the option to cheat till their hearts content with all the other cheats out there, in their own special place.

content: 你好 请核查一下 steam  ID为 lihuayi20171212的玩家 有没有开挂,我玩了六百多个小时据这样无辜的封号了 请给我一个满意的答复  谢谢

上回我和我的盆友玩大逃杀，解果同时被封号了，是永久被封的。而且所有网吧玩这个游戏的人都被封号了，说是用外挂，想不通为什么？就算是用外挂，也不能永久封号，最多封个几个月就可以了，我们花钱买了游戏，不能被这样子对待，要么退钱，要么就吧封给解了，一个游戏98人民币，我向妈妈要了好久，妈妈才给我钱。如果有人用外挂，你可以把他们记录下来，然后让他们交罚款，交了罚款在解封也可以呀？为什么要冤枉好人啊！！！    还有有那么多中国玩家不会英语，而你们在一些关键的地方都显示的是英语，一点都不好。

被封号的原因除了作弊，还是作弊，你可能没作弊，比如你在网吧玩，网吧里面所有的机器只要有一个人作弊，你都有被封号可能，而且还很大，网吧的游戏客户端是存在服务器上的，其他的电脑游戏客户端只是服务器的镜像，有一些外挂会直接嵌入服务器里面的客户端一些数据，比如记录你的键盘键位，录制你的账号和密码，然后后台邮件发出去，你却浑然不知。千万不要以为你这个号作弊了，被封了，那我换个号不作弊，总不会被封号了吧，那你是想多了，检测作弊不仅仅是针对你的账号，你的电脑只要有过作弊行为，除非你卸载游戏重装，甚至重新装电脑系统，不然是没用的。而且，呵呵，外挂这种东西，盗你帐号都是轻的。本身就是违法的东西，盗了你的账号在廉价卖给别人开挂，然后你的号被封了，在网吧玩这样的情况很常见，自己的电脑，只要你正经八经的玩，不会封你的号。自己的电脑被封号，那就是你的电脑不干净，同时多去补一补电脑软件常识，莫名其妙的软件不要下载。另外我由衷的请求国内的大哥们，不要开挂了，不要到处去骂人，你损害的不是你个人的形象，不要到处大喊chinaNO1了，喊着chinaNO1还到处去骂人中国是不是NO1不是靠嘴来说的。当人家问我是哪里人的时候，我请求你们能让我中气十足的说一声I am Chinese。珍爱游戏环境，远离外挂。

topic_title: Game is BROKEN - ALMOST NO LOOT!!!
content: So the last week or so, the loot seems to have been reduced to a new extreme minimum. I've played Squads, Duos and Solos and no matter in which game mode, it's been clear that the loot has been reduced. I find it quite annoying because this game is not about looting primarily. It's a big part of the game but it's just getting out of hands now. It's increasing the luck factor too much when I am just able to find a pistol at Pecado Apartments (BOTH BUILDINGS TOGETHER) and then get lit up by someone with an M4. Wasted 10 minutes of my life. I just played on the classic map and dropped far south on the main Island in that larger compound close to the East Bridge, all I found in 5 large buildings was 1 single AK. And no, it had not been looted before. I jumped there by myself. That is insane. It took me all the way to the TOP 15 until I could finally find a 4x scope. Yet I found about 5 Level 2 vests. It's getting really annoying.

topic_title: Possible fix for crash on clicking ready
content: For those of you having issues when clicking ready in the lobby, such as loading in then getting a CTD. Try this fix, I have been having issues since the emote patch and this has worked for me.You need to reset your WMI. To do this run the cmd prompt winmgmt.exe /resetrepositoryI hope this works for you as I was out of PUBG for over two weeks and finally can play again.Good luck!
